attributes.additional_details:
The condition of the roads in the uk are some of the poorest in Europe and its about time the government finally did something about it!

The councils of the uk have spent millions on damage claims to vehicles due to poor road surfaces and potholes.

Being in the motor trade I have seen millions of motorists having to pay for damage caused by the lack of care and attention caused by the government,

Considering how much the uk motorists pay for road tax I find it disgusting that this isn't being used on fixing roads!

rejection.details: This is a matter for local authorities, depending on how they prioritise their spending.
